title: MC_TAPPETMODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE MC_TAPPETMODE :
This enum specifies the source of the position for tappets (auto, set position, actual position).
It is used at the function block
MC_DigitalCAMSwitch
. In case of auto detection,
the function block decides depending on the control state of the drive if it uses
the set values (
bRegulatorOn
=
TRUE
) or the actual values
(
bRegulatorOn
=
FALSE
).

rows.Name: tp_mode_actualposition
rows.Comment:
Use set values
Use actual values
